msbt.message: The saplings Leif sells are the perfect height for hurdle practice. It's almost like they WANT me to jump them!
Leif's selling some real exotic flower seeds. If you're into gardening, you should definitely see what he's got.Plus it's an excuse to dig in the dirt, which is usually a pretty solid workout, !
I tripped while doing sprints and ended up trampling a few flowers.Everything looked fine, but I still kinda feel bad. I wouldn't wanna wreck someone else's work!
Plants and muscles have got a lot in common, .Like how both see the biggest gains when they get proper hydration and stick to a good maintenance routine.

I am all about Nature Day. It's just the BEST planet to work out on. It's got air, water, gravityeverything!I mean, have you ever tried working out on other planets? It's impossible!So here's to the earth, my very favorite gym, !
